text: Melting ice can not raise sea level. It's a fallacy. A given weight of ice displaces the same weight of water... and upon melting, produces the same amount of ice water. Spring tides aren't caused by melting ice at the poles, or anywhere else, but by seasonal winds and tidal cycles. Another fallacy is the use of face masks to inhibit a virus. A virus floats in the air due to its size, and goes through a face mask like it isn't there for the same reason. There isn't a little size difference in hole size in face masks and viral size.... there's a lot. And, lastly, over fishing isn't destroying the seas, pollution by insecticides is. When did you last hear the song of a robin ? Or, crickets at dusk ? Over fishing had nothing to do with that either, did it ? We still spray on an industrial level, and still have mosquitoes, don't we ? Farmers produce crops en-mass that have no taste, and contribute nothing of value to anyone or anything, other than business.. We gotta eat, but some food IS better than others. I'm into seafood. Seafood gumbo anyone ?

another way exists to communicate about environment.  We have been taught that we must present the most depressing, fear-inducing, apocalyptic views to cultivate change in our communities.

If we stop.  Stop and look in our hearts we know that this fear-based messaging will never work.  How do we respond when someone tries to induce fear in us?  Of course we respond with resistance.

This is a basic human process, and its written into our dna and how our hormones react to perceived threats.  We present threatening images - and our audience goes into fight or flight response with adrenaline, and stress hormones.

If we want to stop climate change, fear won't work.  Its been researched, and we know fear doesn't work.  More important than the research is what we know in our hearts --- we already know fear doesn't work.

What does work is something called "Motivational Interviewing" it is the leading approach to behaviour change, and it is particularly more effective than any other approach with individuals who are resistant to change.

Motivational Interviewing is not motivational speaking.  Motivational speaking is like taking the motivation in me and trying to put it into you.  Motivational interviewing is empathically listening, with acceptance, non-judgment, compassion and collaboration.  It is drawing our the pre-existing motivations that are already there and resolving the resistance that people feel in a non-confrontational human-validating way.

Visit enviromentum.org/calendar to find a list of workshops (these skill workshops are no cost and delivered for the public good).
author: Vince Schutt

text:
No one believes in climate change more than me.
#AlGore and #BillNye are climate change deniers compare to me.
However Anthropogenic global warming is a hoax.
Anthropogenic climate change is complete nonsense.

Carbon dioxide is trace levels in your atmosphere at 400 ppm.
Furthermore, it only holds heat for a few seconds. Therefore CO2
is not the thermostat that controls our climate on this planet.
Carbon dioxide is completely ineffective at driving Climate.

History even records climate change... we all have seen climate change from
the three major Ice-ages recorded in history to the subsequent warming
periods (which were the Medieval warming period in the Roman warming period).

However, Anthropogenic global warming is a complete hoax. CO2
has nothing to do with creating global warming. CO2 Is currently 400 ppm.
That is one carbon-dioxide molecule for every 2500 parts of the atmosphere.
Humans contribute only a scant 16 ppm which is 4% of the total CO2 produced in a year.

CO2 only holds heat for a few seconds and there is not enough to drive climate- it is thermodynamically impossible and yet we are told it is true. Lastly, CO2
will increase only after temperatures rise and conversely CO2 levels drop as
temperatures cool. In other words, CO2 levels are influenced by heat or the lack
thereof and therefore does not drive climate but follow climate. #CLIMATECHANGE

text:
Until the world starts reversing global warming, we are doomed to a future that will cost far more than we can imagine if we don't act now. Our great grand children will be suffering and paying for our mistakes and it will cost many times more to fix it if we don't do something about it now. Nations must work together to stop the causes of climate change because we can't afford to ignore it any longer. We are beginning to see the devastation from it now and it will only get worse every year. If our environment worsens for the world, which most experts agree that it will, it will cost future generations far more than if we do nothing now.  For Americans, if we do nothing, it means that insurers will be unable to pay for the millions of properties that will be lost in a single hurricane, let alone what we can expect to see during future hurricane seasons. Insurance was never meant to withstand global catastrophes such as rising sea levels and massive storms. Today it isn't a matter of if disasters will hit... but when!

One thing we can do to minimize the frequency and intensity of storms,  is to reduce the ocean temperatures that cause them.  We can reduce ocean surface temperatures by several degrees by creating clouds of water to shade the earth. If we do that, than we can reduce the severity of the storms. In the days following 9/11 in America, when all the aircraft was grounded, the temperatures went up by several degrees across the nation. I believe that is because of the lack of contrails created by air traffic. If we can have that kind of impact on our environment without even trying, imagine if we did try! We could use helium air ships to create high altitude contrails to help reduce some of the affects of global warming and it is something we can start doing today without risking any further damage to the planet. It's possible.

text:
Carbon taxes are folly. Deforestation is the problem. Reforestation or land set aside the solution. I‚Äôve witnessed it with my own eyes. 

Born and bred in Africa I witnessed much of the climate change in Zimbabwe as forests were cut down for grain and tobacco cultivation and 80% of the land changed to grassland and semi-desert. The EU land set aside restores nature‚Äôs powers over the climate, fixing carbon dioxide and stabilising temperatures and rainfall.  Why else is earth‚Äôs atmospheric carbon dioxide just 0.04% when it straddles between Venus and Mars orbits each planet with atmospheric carbon dioxide concentrations in excess of 90%? Carbon dioxide is not the demon, it is plant food and plants work for us providing us with food and controlling our climate to be most favourable for life. Carbon dioxide and fossil fuels are just side actors, just like police cars and ambulances are to accident scenes. Just because police cars and ambulances are present at every accident scene does not mean that they caused them. The same with carbon dioxide and fossil fuels, they were mere agents of deforestation but deforestation was the cause of environmental changes. 

So the solution to gaining control over our environment is strengthening nature. 

The first method can be used by you personally to indirectly alter the climate for the better. Change to a keto or paleo diet and minimise your carbohydrate intake. This will not only improve your health and eliminate T2D, but more importantly it will incentivise farmers to plant trees which bind soils and provide nuts and seeds for your keto diet. If you choose a high carbohydrate diet, farmers will respond by cutting down forests to grow grain for your food. So by altering your food intake to a keto or paleo diet, you alter the food chain and thus ultimately the climate. 

See the best keto diet here https://youtu.be/gxLSxt2IKiQ

The second (macro) solution can bring about climate improvement is as follows. 

1) Build plant factories to feed 7.8 billion people and liberate land and water for forests
https://youtu.be/dnCQuwCtqJg
https://youtu.be/qGyAeqdkkbw
https://youtu.be/ESuzrY2abAw

See examples of working plant factories
https://youtu.be/5clOYWsNhhk
https://youtu.be/4CMfPLEtQMQ

2) Use cattle herds to revitalise soil
https://youtu.be/vpTHi7O66pI

3) Use goats to reduce fire dangers in forests
https://youtu.be/g9yiclBCxMo 

4) Use agrivoltaics to turn deserts into meadows with solar panels
https://youtu.be/XwFB22r9zRo
https://youtu.be/CS3bBO05fpU

5) Use marine cloud seeding to moisten and seed ocean air for clouds and rain
https://youtu.be/Awf1W0-UMR4

6) Use minerals to assist salmon populations 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haida_Salmon_Restoration_Corporation

Be positive. Be useful. Don‚Äôt be misanthropic with the debunked carbon dioxide nonsense. Help flora and fauna control climate and don‚Äôt demonise plant food.

These days logical debate in an adult manner is always met with treat of the week phrases like "antivaxer" " climate change denier" " conspiracy theorist" " trump supporter"  etc.   The entirety of human knowledge is available with the click of a button and yet humanity has never been so absolutely stupid. Big Al you're at least 20 years too late with this documentary, stop with all this nonsense talk about 'recovery'........ it takes thousands of years to remove CO2 from atmosphere, you don't 're-freeze- permafrost, you don't make new glaciers over night, bottom line Al, humanity has created a nightmare and there is no easy way out of it.  

What is amazing about all these climate documentaries is they never talk about what brought us to this point? Wasn't fossil fuels, anybody who wants to put the blame on fossil fuels is ignoring the real 'root cause' for this mess - quadrupling the world population since 1950, it's called 'The Great Acceleration' by paleontologists, and it is the real cause for CC today. This planet cannot support sustainably 8 or 10 billion humans living 21st century lifestyles - IT CANNOT without serious irrecoverable damage - look around you today, just look at what corporations are doing to the planet in an attempt to sustain 8 billion humans! text:
There is no Greenhouse effect, it is made up.
Science has calculated that the Earth's average temperature based on the amount of sunlight received at the surface should be -18 deg C. Yet the average temperature of the near surface atmosphere is ~15 deg C. So science now needs to explain why this is so, and made up the Greenhouse effect.

Logic should tell you that -18 deg C could not create our climate yet it does. You see an average is just an average and meaningless. The Earth receives fare more energy at the equator than the overall average, average temperatures at the equator are around 32 deg C. This is how our climate is created and no made up Greenhouse effect is needed.

text: ¬†@Chris Mitchell¬† That is simply not true. Humankind has always experienced all kinds of trouble due to climatic changes, from the ice ages, to the formation of deserts like the Sahara, to the climate changes that lead to the downfall of the Roman Empire and other civilizations. The great hoax about climate change is not about its existence, which is undeniable: it is about making people believe that we can control the climate and that it is just lack of political will that keep us from doing it. The truth is we do not even understand the climate well. We are extremely far away from anything close to controlling it. In fact we do not even know what climate would be the best for humankind. There has been no discussion about this fundamental issue. What kind of climate do we want in the world? Which one is the most favorable for humankind? What happens if this climate favor some countries and undermines others? Where is it written on stone that the current climate is the optimum? I do not even know where we want to go!
author: Alfredo Rebolar

text:
¬†@Alfredo Rebolar¬† "The great hoax about climate change is not about its existence, which is undeniable: it is about making people believe that we can control the climate and that it is just lack of political will that keep us from doing it."

text:
HEADLINE:  Call off the hysteria; it was all a colossal mistake! Atmospheric carbon dioxide creates and fuels life on Earth, and is a precious asset like water, not a villain to be feared.  CO2 is colorless, odorless, nontoxic, and is most definitely NOT a pollutant.  If we could triple atmospheric carbon dioxide levels, which would be very difficult to accomplish, we would only make plants grow faster, bigger, and more resistant to drought.  We would not alter Earth‚Äôs average temperature, which varies up and down due to natural forces that have nothing to do with the tiny trace gases.  CO2 represents just .04% of our atmosphere and methane just .00017%. 

The sun is the dominant controller of Earth‚Äôs temperature.  The Earth‚Äôs average temperature is now only .8 degrees Celsius warmer than it was in 1880.  A temperature increase of less than one degree Celsius is not a ‚Äúclimate crisis.‚Äù  Carbon dioxide and methane have no influence on temperature other than by their miniscule contribution to atmospheric mass, which creates atmospheric pressure.  NASA space probe data shows us that the atmospheric pressure of planets plus their distance from the sun determines average temperature, not a greenhouse gas effect.  You cannot build a boat out of a badminton net or a greenhouse out of gas.

We create, transport, and store all of our food with the absolutely essential help of oil and natural gas.  No fossil fuels means no food!  For sane and sober climate science, please see New Climate Discovery at http://renewable.50webs.com/Zeller.Nikolov.html and watch Balloons in the Air: Understanding Weather and Climate on YouTube at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XfRBr7PEawY

text: ¬†@Eric Milliot¬†  Where does the money to pay the carbon tax come from? To answer my own question, it comes from producing goods and selling them to earn the carbon tax money, which in turn pollutes environments even more. Moreover, at least before Covid-19 came roaring into our lives, most people were obliged to travel to work so that money could be earned to pay for living costs, including carbon taxes. Most people have no choice but to travel to work, and should not be punished with extra taxes for doing what social conditions force them to do. While the tax may indeed discourage unnecessary travel, the effort will be dwarfed and nullified by the added income that must be earned to pay for the tax.... If we could eliminate work obligations and reduce them, then it might make sense, otherwise this sword is double-edged.

text: The year of climate extremes? That's how nature takes its course. About 12000 years ago we had an ice age when most of the northern hemisphere was covered by ice. How did all the ice disappear? The answer is an extremely accelerated global warming and the carbon content in the atmosphere was all time high at the end of the ice ago when the temperature started rising... unfortunately (or fortunately) the earth is still on its warming phase as of the year 2020. How did it happen? Did our stone age ancestors burn too much fossil fuel? Of course not. It's mainly because of astrophysical reasons such as the wobble of earth rotating axis and orbiting distance, etc.. And the earth has experienced much more devastating climate extremes in the past according to ancient historians and geological evidences. This warming trend will continue (arctic ice and glaciers will continuously shrink) until the earth switches back into another cooling phase leading to the next ice age. This man-made climate change is all about politics. But pollution is man-made and heath hazard.

text:
¬†@dee b¬† 
The following is my response to your comments.  I am in no way trying to insult you.  I'm am only presenting my take on the Bible from studying it.

believe in God's word Not the propaganda coming from this system.
Can you prove what is written in the Bible came from God?  Or do you just have Faith that leads no one to truth!

God didn't inspire the Bible.  I say this because if God inspired the Bible, it would not be so ambiguous requiring interpretation, or full of errors!

Some big Errors in the Bible

Genesis 1;11
"And God said, "Let the earth sprout vegetation, plants yielding seed, and fruit trees bearing fruit in which is their seed, each according to its kind, on the earth." And it was so.
God creates the earth and Trees and Plants before God created the Sun and the Stars.  How does that work?

GENESIS 2;4-3;24 Adam and Eve
Evolution, which is true based on fossil records demonstrating evolution through speciation debunks the Adam and Eve story.  Denying evolution, given all the evidence for evolution, for a fairy tale of two people, where God put them in a lovely place, but also put in a temptation God knew they would fail is sick!  God is supposed to know everything including the future so God set them up for failure!  That's an evil God!

Genesis 7‚Äì8 The Great Flood
We now know, through Science investigation that there could have never been enough water to flood the entire earth above the tops of mountains.  Even if you consider the groundwater, there is still not enough.  Many apologists who realize a "World Flood" is not physically possible, resort to calling it a local flood.  This completely contradicts the Bible.  Therefore the proof these words were not inspired by God.

Genesis 11;1‚Äì9  Tower of Babalon
"But the Lord came down to see the city and the tower the people were building. 6 The Lord said, ‚ÄúIf as one people speaking the same language they have begun to do this, then nothing they plan to do will be impossible for them. 7 Come, let us go down and confuse their language so they will not understand each other.‚Äù

Not having a common language has not stopped people from working together.  We see this today.  Besides, why was God not stopping people today building skyscrapers much higher than any Tower that could be built back then.  God does not seem to be bothered.

Joshua 10;13
"So the sun stood still and the moon stopped until the nation took vengeance upon its enemies. Is this not written in the Book of Jashar? ‚ÄúSo the sun stopped in the middle of the sky and delayed going down about a full day.‚Äù

God stopped the Sun and the Moon for a full day so there would be more daylight for fighting.  So how can the Sun and moon stop for a full day?  Plus, back then, they thought the Sun rotated around the Earth and we know the opposite is true so did a perfect God get this wrong?

10 Bible reasons why a wife must submit to her husband regardless of culture:
https://www.bible.ca/marriage/submission-independent-of-culture.htm
Throughout the Bible, women are cast as lower than men.  Women are not well respected in the Bible and this is evident that a women's name in the Bible is rarely mentioned but Men's names are always mentioned.

Other than "Faith," which is not evidence, is there any actual evidence of what is written in the Bible is true?

Why are you not a Muslim or a Hindu?
They believe in what they are taught!  Are they wrong?  If you comment yes, please provide evidence to support your claims.

 I do not believe the Bible was inspired by God and is the words of men trying to explain our existence.  Note how God changes personality from the Old Testimate to the New Testimate.  A clear indication the Bible is not inspired by God, the perfect being!

text:
¬†@TheTK¬† I am almost certain you do not believe this truth, but in the beginning of time, we used to actually live a pretty long time. People‚Äôs age range of living, was from about 60-969. But then God decided that man should live only up to about 120 years. The Word is the truth and the Truth is God and The Word is God. It‚Äôs so much that I could on about honestly, but the thing is the Word (or Bible as some people call it, which I do not condone) is not to be debated as if it were a political debate or a science project. That is why there are many false/ignorant believers/followers (or Christians as they and others refer to them/themselves which I also don‚Äôt condone) As I am not here to establish a religion. Religion is a man-made construct among other false things. Who give a false sense of him, and hey I‚Äôve done it too. I‚Äôm sorry on all our behalf‚Äôs us true followers who mess up. 

Following Jesus/God is to be part of his Kingdom. The Kingdom of God, that is. I know where you are at somewhat, because I used to have a very negative ideology towards Jesus and what he stands for. The reason being.. because simply...I did not have eyes to see and hears to hear. You can go back and forth with scripture, and it is not a crime or sin I should say, but when you try to figure it out as if it were your AP/IB Calculus project, it is impossible to understand it. That what I was trying to do. It was just a load of bologna to me! I‚Äôm not here trying to twist your hand (God forbid!) because I‚Äôll tell you this right now, no human being ever will ever be able to convince you of the Truth, which is Jesus/God/Holy Spirit besides God himself. But I‚Äôll tell you something else. You hold the keys to unlock the Truth. To see what‚Äôs really going on in the universe. To see, why it is, that you have felt like calling it quits. Why it is that no one quite really understands you to the T... not even yourself if you reflect with maturity and honesty upon yourself. Who can be so sure of themselves? If so, we‚Äôll then I‚Äôd be perfect already! As I was saying, yes indeed you do have the keys! It‚Äôs called faith. This is how you receive the Holy Spirit. Having faith that Jesus is real, that he‚Äôs not a folklore character, because someone mustered up the brains enough to create this long and intricate fable story book. The Holy Spirit would love to make an abode in your temple (your body) and he‚Äôll lead you and guide you‚Äîyou gotta have faith, though, that through whatever it is, he‚Äôll see you through‚Äî because faith is hard, I‚Äôll be the first one to call myself out! In the start of my walk.... my faith was very shaky. I had ups and downs, kept trying to slip and go back to my old ways (my wisdom, my understanding, the worlds wisdom/understanding)  and Jesus didn‚Äôt give up on me! I got better and better! Every fall I had, whatever it was, my spirit was growing stronger! Like a workout almost if you will? So yes every fall, quicker to rise and stand firm! lasting longer from my fall! The thing that kept me going was, I know Jesus can get me through! If I slipped up it‚Äôs because it was my fault! More and more I began to take accountability and responsibility. Even though I could not see it! I was like well, honestly, I sorta feel like this is someone else‚Äôs fault (be it God or human or whatever) it was like a half-half type of recognition on my part. It was a ‚Äúyes! But....‚Äù excuse attitude for myself. Faith is key, as corny as that might come off. It‚Äôs the foundation of your walk. And faith is believing and    Not   seeing... which as it sounds is scary.    I had so much pride in me, that gosh...led to many problems in my life! Pride is a sneaky/cunning devil! He knows just how to get you. But your God is the Most High God and  you can  overcome. Ask Jesus to help you have faith in him. To give you those eyes to see and ears to hear! To reveal to you all lie and deceit not just in the universe but within yourself as well as your life. You‚Äôd be surprised.....   

Read these aloud if you would? They truly hold power. These words are living. 

"Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen." "And without faith it is impossible to please Him, for he who comes to God must believe that He is and that He is a rewarder of those who seek Him." "Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding.

7 Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.


If any of you lacks wisdom, you should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to you.


Like I said, I‚Äôm not here to convince, as I cannot. But to share the Truth to whom ever I can.   It‚Äôs up to you, to believe (have faith)     Take care.
author: Ariel Salem

author: TheTK

text:
¬†@TheTK¬†    Yeah God can seemingly appear to ‚Äú‚Äùus‚Äù‚Äù‚Äù as ‚Äúillogical‚Äù because we have human brains..(which is why we need to humble ourselves unto the Lord God Jesus Christ)  because whatever can‚Äôt be ‚Äúproved‚Äù by science/math or whatever, is just too much for us to wrap our little human brains around, because again we are humans.. and it comes off as ‚Äúillogical‚Äù 

Like water for instance, which is something the Holy Spirit has shown me and I‚Äôve told others as well. All this time we have just been walking around through water right? I put a de-humidifier on for some hours and it legit collected maybe like 5-8 glasses of water in there. And I thought to myself wow... this whole time these glasses full of water have just been floating through my atmosphere ... where I breathe! Oxygen! And h20! Woah! Stellar huh? Yet I couldn‚Äôt see it with my eyes but it didn‚Äôt change the Truth that it was there.  Ages ago if you told someone that and in all your being you knew the thing to be true without a doubt, they would call you a crazy person! A witch! A charlatan! Time after time, God proves us, how lowly we are as creation. Yet we remain stiff-necked! and close minded! as you are. That is why you can‚Äôt access God. Because you are proud/prideful. Even if you want to believe in Jesus or already do! You get resistance from him.    ( James 4-6 check it out please, it‚Äôs logical, as you seem to show favoritism  towards logic)     

He‚Äôll help you out as he did for me but a huge reason the road has been so bumpy for me is because of my pride, which I now see because I believe in him.   (Have faith in Jesus, that is. Glory to the Most High God!)      I‚Äôm still battling it everyday. Albeit, I can for sure humble myself way better now and receive correction from him so that I may be humbled, so that I may be wise, and so that I may be of understanding. (His divine infinite perfect in all his ways, wisdom/understanding‚Äînot faulty, and imperfect wisdom/understanding..... like ours is as humans and the other false entities roaming this universe)   So:  I take the scolding and rebuke with maturity/humility although it doesn‚Äôt necessarily feel so ‚Äúnice and sweet‚Äù at hand,  reason being is  I see and hear the growth there is in taking heed to his perfect correction. It is not for my harm but rather for my well-being. Like when you get scolded by a teacher for missing an assignment or your parental figures for doing mal. Even if you don‚Äôt have the maturity level to comprehend their correction so that you might take heed unto their better sound judgment, it doesn‚Äôt change the truth of them being right. You can either stay there and ‚Äúbe right‚Äù in your pride and ultimately cause yourself to remain stupid or swallow it and bring yourself to humility. So : that you can grow and learn to be better. Check out Proverbs 12:1. It‚Äôs logical, and you love logic, right? You can never go wrong with your logic, right? That‚Äôs why you prefer it right?   You rely on logic you say, correct? 

Logical :  of or according to the rules of logic or formal argument

Logic : reasoning conducted or assessed according to strict principles of validity.

So like math right? Or like science right? So that‚Äôs uhm.....like logical right? Well here‚Äôs some math which  is * inserts italics for the word typically*    typically emphasis on  ‚Äútypically‚Äù because you see here we have some beautiful math being drum roll    illogical!   But yet you rely on math and on science right? Because that‚Äôs what the U.S and every other nation confide in by default. Because If the case were that we did truly fully rely on God as Adam and Eve did at one point till they were prideful and disobeyed because they relied on their wisdom and their understanding not God‚Äôs.   So yeah they actually did have a perfect utopia. It‚Äôs when we become prideful that we get the old ball called ‚Äúour down fall‚Äù to get rolling.  

Math being illogical below : 


The following taken from a game show:
The candidate would have to predict behind which of three doors the price would be. What‚Äôs the probability to guess the right door? Right, that‚Äôs easy: 1/3. The probability that the prize is behind a given door is 1/3 for each door.
After the candidate has chosen ‚Äúhis‚Äù door, one of the remaining doors ‚Äî not containing the prize ‚Äî is opened. At this point the candidate is offered the opportunity to change his choice to the other remaining door.
Should he change his selection? After all, we have just said that the probability that the price is behind any given door is 1/3 for each door.
Apparently many mathematicians at that time were convinced that changing the selection at that point would not provide any benefit. The few convinced otherwise actually had to remind the many that mathematical facts are not decided by popular vote.
In reality however, the probability that the price is behind the ‚Äúother‚Äù door is twice as high (2/3) as the probability that it is behind the door initially selected. Why is this?
The probability that your original choice was correct is not influenced by showing another door without prize. There‚Äôs always another door without prize. So it stays at 1/3. Since we know that the opened door does not have the prize behind it (probability equals to 0), the probability x that the prize is behind the second door is 2/3, because the sum (1/3 + x + 0) must be one. If you‚Äôre not convinced, it‚Äôs easy to write down all possible outcomes of this game on a piece of paper and count.
If you find this counter-intuitive, imagine another game with 1000 doors. You select one door, then you are being shown 998 doors without prize. Knowing that the prize must be either behind the door you have initially picked or behind the second door not initially picked ‚Äî do you think it‚Äôs more likely that you originally picked the right door out of 1000, or that the prize is behind the other remaining door?


And yes all nations besides those individuals who fear and reverence the Lord God Almighty by default do not rely on Jesus because if that were so, we wouldn‚Äôt be where we are now. We‚Äôd all run to God instead of modern science/technology/math.....but .....I mean, at the end of the day...they‚Äôre sorta all intertwined right? 

Don‚Äôt be stupid, please. Take care.

text: I had the opportunity to drive up the Rhone valley in Switzerland, to the top of the pass where the lower end of the Rhone glacier is, and they have a hiking trail there, with markers showing where the foot of the glacier was year by year.  The thing that surprised me was that the distance between markers was growing, with each successive marker.  So, not only has the glacier been receding year by year, it is doing so at an increasing rate.  I imagine in five years they will have extended the glacier trail by half a mile?
